title.newValue: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft Purview | Information Barriers - Segments and Policies landing pages

description.newValue:
,The Information Barriers solution within the Microsoft Purview compliance portal enables organizations to restrict communication and collaboration between two user groups to avoid a conflict of interest from occurring. This user experience (UX) update adds solution landing pages for management of segments and policies.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/information-barriers-policies?view=o365-worldwide
Preview date: November CY2021
